articles.content: The All Blacks have slumped to their worst season in 12 years after a historic result heaped more misery on southern hemisphere rugby.France made a massive statement as they beat New Zealand by a rec… [+4152 chars]

articles.author: Tracey Holmes
articles.title: Can Qatar reshape its image on the back of the 2022 FIFA World Cup? - ABC News
articles.description: With only a year until it hosts the World Cup, Qatar has undergone significant change. But for some of its critics, it is still not enough, writes Tracey Holmes.
articles.content: Slavery was officially abolished in Qatar in the 1950s but in 2010, when the resources-rich nation won the right to host the 2022 FIFA World Cup, human rights groups were quick to point out the count… [+9220 chars]

articles.author: Riccardo Gugliemetti
articles.title: SBK, Toprak: “I could be happy, but I feel bad for Rea” - GPone English
articles.description: “I prefer to put myself in his shoes, also because I came here to race and try to win all three races. Today, the situation was dangerous, you couldn’t see the corners. The World Championship? In Turkey, everyone is waiting for this moment.”
articles.content: Race 1 will replace tomorrows Superpole Race. Consequently, the new weekend format works in Topraks favor, since there will be one less race. In fact, Razgatlioglu will only need a 20-point spread be… [+2050 chars]
